data.title: Cat And Genny (cable Avoidance) Training Courses In Derby & Across The Central Region
data.meta_description: Book Cable Avoidance Tool training courses in Derby, on-site or as an open course. Schedule updates most days. Covering the central area
data.text:
Cat And Genny (cable Avoidance) Training Courses In Derby

Derby / Central Region

Regular Derby Venue

Unit 10, Derwent Business Centre, Clarke St, Derby, Derbyshire, Derby, Central, UK, DE12BU. t: 0844 335 8882 e: [email protected]

Opening / Training Hours

Monday - Friday | 8.00am to 5.30pm | Weekend on request

Course Information

To provide awareness and competence training in the use of cable locators as this is widely recognised as one of the key steps to reducing cable strikes.

Who Should Attend?

Cable Avoidance and Service Location CAT & Genny training is designed for any person working on the roads, setting out before a build, surveying and any other person excavating an area where pipes or cables may be hidden underground.

Joining Instructions

Specific joining instructions will be supplied to you (if appropriate) once your booking is confirmed. If, once confirmation has been received, you are in anyway unsure of what prerequisites or items you need to bring or provide, then your dedicated training manager or the trainer conducting your course will be able to confirm this with you. Contact numbers and ways to get in touch will be provided.

About Derby

Motto: "Industria, Virtus, et Fortitudo" Derby shown within Derbyshire and England Coordinates: 52°55.32′N 1°28.55′W / 52.92200°N 1.47583°W / 52.92200; -1.47583 Sovereign state United Kingdom Constituent country England Region East Midlands Ceremonial county Derbyshire Admin HQ Derby Settled AD 600 City Status 1977 Government • Type Unitary authority, City • Governing body Derby City Council • Leadership Leader & Cabinet • Executive Labour • MPs Margaret Beckett (L) Chris Williamson (L) Area •..

More Information

At Xyz Training Group, we understand the importance of safety and efficiency in any construction or excavation project. Thats why we offer the best CAT and Genny Cable Avoidance training course in the Street Works family. Our comprehensive course covers everything from the basics to advanced techniques, ensuring that candidates are well-equipped to handle any situation. ##$$##Enrolling in our CAT and Genny training course means investing in the safety and success of your team. Our experienced trainers have a wealth of knowledge and practical experience in the industry, and they are dedicated to providing top-notch training to our clients. With over 50 centres across the UK, we make it convenient for candidates to attend our open courses. Alternatively, we can also arrange a dedicated course for your team at your preferred location. ##$$##At Xyz Training Group, we are committed to providing our clients with the best value for their money. Thats why we offer our unique Lowest Price Guarantee. We promise to match or beat any competitors price for the same course, ensuring that you get the best training at the most competitive price. With us, you can be confident that you are getting the best training at the best price. ##$$##Dont compromise on safety and efficiency in your construction or excavation projects. Enrol your team in our CAT and Genny training course today and experience the Xyz Training Group difference. With our expert trainers, convenient locations, and unbeatable prices, we are the top choice for all your training needs. Contact us now to book your course and take the first step towards a safer and more successful project.
